name: Sriracha Ketchup
description: Sriracha and ketchup together make a great condiment, but add a little honey for some contrast with the heat, rice vinegar for extra tang, and lime and cilantro for freshness, and it's pretty killer.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons freshly squeezed juice from 1 lime
2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh cilantro leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together ketchup, sriracha, honey, lime juice, cilantro, and vinegar in a small bowl. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to two weeks.
